directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir French fries in hot butter until browned and hot, 3 to 5 minutes. Add eggs and season with salt and black pepper; cook and stir until eggs are scrambled and set, 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1/4 cup frozen French fries, or to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Eggs n' Fries
